name: Under Attack!
description:
Invaders are coming! Grab your torches!

How to Play

Your goal is to catch the torches being passed to you. Don't let any drop!

*Sound Included

Controls

Mouse click on torches to catch them.

*Best Played in Full Screen Mode

Jam Information

Weekly Game Jam - Week 168, Theme: 'Pass the Torch'

Credits:

Programming by Debbie Berlin "Game Dev Debbie"
